org.elasticsearch.test.rest.client

Class RestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.test.rest.client.RestClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RestClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    REST client used to test the elasticsearch REST layer Holds the RestSpec used to translate api calls into REST calls

        Throws:
        RestException - if the obtained status code is non ok, unless the specific error code needs to be ignored according to the ignore parameter received as input (which won't get sent to elasticsearch)
